summary: Guide to deploying LangGraph agents on LangSmith Cloud, covering prerequisites, deployment steps, and integration with GitHub, Studio, REST API, and Python SDK.

structure.title: LangSmith Deployment
structure.summary: Guide to deploying LangGraph agents on LangSmith Cloud, a managed platform for stateful, long-running agents, covering prerequisites and deployment steps.

nodes.title: Prerequisites
nodes.summary: Lists the required accounts (GitHub and LangSmith) needed before starting the deployment process.

nodes.path: deploy > LangSmith Deployment > Deploy your agent
nodes.title: Deploy your agent
nodes.summary: A guide to deploying LangGraph agents on LangSmith, covering GitHub setup, deployment steps, testing in Studio, and API integration.

nodes.path: deploy > LangSmith Deployment > Deploy your agent > 1. Create a repository on GitHub
nodes.title: 1. Create a repository on GitHub
nodes.summary: A GitHub repository (public or private) is required for deploying LangGraph-compatible applications on LangSmith.

nodes.path: deploy > LangSmith Deployment > Deploy your agent > 2. Deploy to LangSmith
nodes.title: 2. Deploy to LangSmith
nodes.summary: Steps to deploy an agent to LangSmith, including navigating to deployments, creating a new deployment, linking a GitHub repository, and submitting the deployment.

nodes.path: deploy > LangSmith Deployment > Deploy your agent > 3. Test your application in Studio
nodes.title: 3. Test your application in Studio
nodes.summary: Instructions for testing a deployed application in LangSmith Studio by selecting the deployment and opening the graph view.

nodes.path: deploy > LangSmith Deployment > Deploy your agent > 4. Get the API URL for your deployment
nodes.title: 4. Get the API URL for your deployment
nodes.summary: Instructions for copying the API URL from the LangGraph deployment details view.

nodes.path: deploy > LangSmith Deployment > Deploy your agent > 5. Test the API
nodes.title: 5. Test the API
nodes.summary: Provides instructions for testing a deployed LangGraph agent API using Python SDK and REST API calls.
